entry.title: $1950 // HOT!!Massive one bed on FRANKLIN ave!!incredible location!!
entry.content:
Beautiful Large 1 bd ON EASTERN PARKWAY AND FRANKLIN AVE!!

SUN SOAKED APARTMENT!!!

Located Less then half a block from Starbucks, the 2,3,4,5 trains and countless bars, restaurants, cafes and grocery

Fantastic layout.
Eat in kitchen
BRAND NEW bathroom,
quiet and very sunny bedroom, all in a fantastic location!

Huge bedroom, huge separate living room and brand new separate kitchen

Gorgeous WOOD floors
TONS of windows, very sunny!

Also Located on the gorgeous tree lined Eastern Parkway just A block away from brooklyn museum and a very short walk to prospect park
____________________________
This Apartment is in a gorgeous Brooklyn PREWAR building it has a great feel to it! It is located on a great block with beautiful trees, right ON eastern parkway. Steps to Franklin ave Brooklyn Museum, Botanical gardens, Prospect park and The Brooklyn Public Library.

sorry no dogs :((

Gorgeous WOOD floors
TONS of windows, very sunny!

Elevator building
Heat and hot water included

Call/text Naomi to view!!
